Articles.Content:
Compact, lightweight propeller plane, with near infinite range. Possible recharge while flying, control via relay network or kerbal. Able to survive signal loss inflight until next relay satellite in reach, due to its low minimal speed.

Built for eve. Up to 10km, 128m/s, recharge inflight, 37 parts, 948 kg. Breaking Grounds mandatory, no mods

Controls: 1: enable thrust / main thrust: rotor speed

Download: https://kerbalx.com/Tahib/Eve-Flieger-bbq
